Altroz.Title: TATA ALTROZ
Altroz.description: Tata Altroz is a premium hatchback known for its stylish design, spacious interior, and strong safety features. With both petrol and diesel engine options, it offers good performance and fuel efficiency, ideal for city and highway drives. Rated 5 stars in safety by Global NCAP, it stands out in its segment with advanced safety features. Competing with models like the Maruti Baleno and Hyundai i20, Altroz is a popular choice among Indian buyers looking for a balanced, feature-rich, and safe hatchback.

Tiago.Title: TATA TIAGO
Tiago.description: Tata Tiago is a compact, budget-friendly hatchback with stylish looks, a comfortable interior, and reliable performance. Known for its fuel efficiency and ease of driving in city traffic, it also has a 4-star safety rating from Global NCAP, making it a safe choice in its segment. With features like a touchscreen infotainment system and good build quality, Tiago is a popular option among small families and first-time buyers looking for an affordable yet stylish and safe car.

Tigor.Title: TATA Tigor
Tigor.description: The Tata Tiago NRG is a rugged, crossover-inspired version of the Tata Tiago, designed for those looking for a hatchback with a sporty and adventurous edge.

Punch.Title: TATA Punch
Punch.description: The Tata Punch is a compact SUV from Tata Motors, designed for those who want a small, city-friendly SUV with the toughness and high ground clearance of a larger vehicle.

Harrier.Title: TATA Harrier
Harrier.description: The Tata Nexon is a popular compact SUV from Tata Motors, known for its stylish design, strong performance, and high safety standards.

Curvv.Title: TATA CURVV
Curvv.description: The Tata Curvv is a futuristic electric SUV concept from Tata Motors, blending coupe-inspired design with SUV functionality. It showcases Tata’s vision for the next generation of electric vehicles (EVs) with a focus on sleek aesthetics, advanced technology, and sustainability.

Nexon Ev.Title: TATA Nexon EV
Nexon Ev.Engine: The Tata Nexon EV has one electric engine and an automatic transmission.
Nexon Ev.description: The Tata Nexon EV is an electric version of the popular Nexon SUV, offering a stylish, eco-friendly option with modern features and excellent range, making it one of India’s top-selling electric vehicles.

Punch Ev.Title: TATA PUNCH EV
Punch Ev.description: The Tata Punch EV is an electric variant of the compact Tata Punch SUV, designed to provide an eco-friendly, city-friendly driving experience with SUV appea

Tiago Ev.Title: TATA TIAGO EV
Tiago Ev.description: The Tata Tiago EV is the electric version of Tata's popular Tiago hatchback, offering an affordable and practical entry into the electric vehicle (EV) market.

Verito Vibe.Title: MAHINDRA VERITO VIBE
Verito Vibe.description: The Mahindra Verito Vibe was a compact, sub-4-meter hatchback, based on the Verito sedan, with a focus on affordability and practicality. It was equipped with a 1.5-liter diesel engine that produced 64.1 bhp, delivering a fuel-efficient performance with a mileage of around 20-21 kmpl​

Mahindra KUV100.Title: MAHINDRA KUV100
Mahindra KUV100.description: The Mahindra KUV100 is a compact, quirky crossover with a bold design, aimed at buyers seeking a small SUV-like vehicle. With its SUV styling cues like roof rails, wide grille, and plastic cladding, it stands out in the urban hatchback category.

Mahindra Verito vibe.Title: MAHINDRA VERITO VIBE
Mahindra Verito vibe.img1: The Mahindra KUV100 is a compact, quirky crossover with a bold design, aimed at buyers seeking a small SUV-like vehicle. With its SUV styling cues like roof rails, wide grille, and plastic cladding, it stands out in the urban hatchback category.
Mahindra Verito vibe.description: The car featured a clean and functional design, with details like a fixed rear windscreen, smoked headlamps, and alloy wheels. However, it did not receive a positive market response, leading to the suspension of its production in 2016. Despite this, it was appreciated for its spacious cabin, decent road stability, and solid engine performance.​

Mahindra Thar.Title: MAHINDRA THAR
Mahindra Thar.description: The Mahindra Thar is a rugged and iconic off-road SUV that blends classic design with modern features. Known for its superior off-road capabilities, it offers a 4x4 drivetrain, making it ideal for adventurous drives on rough terrain.

Mahindra XUV 3XO.Title: MAHINDRA XUV 3XO
Mahindra XUV 3XO.description: The Mahindra XUV 3XO is a compact SUV that combines advanced technology, a modern design, and a spacious interior. It stands out with a polarizing front design, featuring a gloss black grille, LED DRLs, and projector headlamps.

Mahindra XUV700.Title: MAHINDRA XUV700
Mahindra XUV700.description: The Mahindra XUV700 is a premium SUV that blends performance, comfort, and advanced technology. It is available with two engine options: a 2.0-liter turbocharged petrol engine that delivers 197 hp, and a 2.2-liter diesel engine, paired with either a manual or automatic transmission.

Mahindra Bolero Neo+.Title: MAHINDRA BOLERO NEO+
Mahindra Bolero Neo+.description: The Mahindra Bolero Neo+ is a sturdy SUV variant in the Bolero lineup, developed to cater to those needing a spacious, reliable vehicle. It is based on the older TUV300 platform but has been extended in length to accommodate a 9-seat configuration, suitable for both urban and rural terrains.

Mahindra XUV 3XO.Title: MAHINDRA XUV 3XO
Mahindra XUV 3XO.description: The Mahindra XUV 3XO EV is an upcoming electric SUV based on the XUV300, positioned below the XUV400 EV in Mahindra's lineup. Expected for release in late 2024, the XUV 3XO EV is likely to feature a 35kWh battery, offering competitive range and energy efficiency, though exact mileage details haven't been fully disclosed.

Maruti suzuki S-Presso.Title: MARUTI SUZUKI S-PRESSO
Maruti suzuki S-Presso.description: The Maruti Suzuki S-Presso is a compact, entry-level hatchback designed with SUV-inspired styling. It has a high seating position, tall stance, and a bold front grille, giving it a unique presence among small cars.

Maruti suzuki swift.Title: MARUTI SUZUKI SWIFT
Maruti suzuki swift.description: The Maruti Suzuki Swift is a popular hatchback in India known for its sporty look, fuel efficiency, and enjoyable driving dynamics. Powered by a 1.2-liter petrol engine that delivers around 89 horsepower, it offers smooth and responsive performance, with a choice between manual and AMT (automatic) transmissions.

Maruti suzuki Dzire.Title: MARUTI SUZUKI DZIRE
Maruti suzuki Dzire.description: The Maruti Suzuki Dzire is a compact sedan known for its elegant design, fuel efficiency, and comfortable ride. Powered by a 1.2-liter petrol engine producing around 89 horsepower, the Dzire offers smooth performance with both 5-speed manual and AMT (automatic) transmission options.

Maruti suzuki Ciaz.Title: MARUTI SUZUKI CIAZ
Maruti suzuki Ciaz.description: The Maruti Suzuki Ciaz is a mid-sized sedan that combines style, comfort, and efficiency, appealing to buyers seeking a premium feel in an affordable package. It is powered by a 1.5-liter petrol engine that produces around 103 horsepower, paired with either a 5-speed manual or 4-speed automatic transmission.

Maruti Suzuki Fronx.Title: MARUTI SUZUKI FRONX
Maruti Suzuki Fronx.description: The Maruti Suzuki Fronx is a compact SUV that combines a modern design with the brand's reputation for efficiency and reliability. Launched in 2023, the Fronx stands out for its bold coupe-inspired design, offering a sporty look with a sloping roofline that resembles a compact crossover.

Maruti suzuki Brezza.Title: MARUTI SUZUKI BREZZA
Maruti suzuki Brezza.description: The Maruti Suzuki Brezza is a popular compact SUV in India, known for its stylish look, robust build, and efficient performance. Powered by a 1.5-liter K-series petrol engine, it generates around 103 hp and comes with both manual and automatic transmission options.

Maruti Suzuki Brezza ZXI.Title: MARUTI SUZUKI BREZZA ZXI
Maruti Suzuki Brezza ZXI.description: The Maruti Suzuki Brezza EV is an upcoming electric version of the popular Brezza SUV, designed to meet growing demand for eco-friendly vehicles in India. This electric variant is expected to offer an impressive range of approximately 550 kilometers on a single charge, thanks to its powerful 60kWh lithium-ion battery pack.

Maruti suzuki Fronx Alpha.Title: MARUTI SUZUKI FRONX ALPHA
Maruti suzuki Fronx Alpha.description: The Maruti Suzuki Fronx Alpha variant is a feature-packed offering in the compact crossover segment. It includes a stylish exterior with LED projector headlamps, dual-tone color options, and premium alloy wheels.

Toyota Glanza.Title: TOYOTA GLANZA
Toyota Glanza.description: The Toyota Glanza is a premium hatchback offering with a 1.2-liter engine, delivering a peppy performance. It's available with both manual and AMT (Automated Manual Transmission) options. The car offers excellent ride quality, with a newly improved suspension, making it comfortable for city driving.

Toyota Camry.Title: TOYOTA CAMRY
Toyota Camry.description: The Toyota Camry, soon to receive its ninth generation in early 2025, is a luxury hybrid sedan that builds on its longstanding legacy. The new model features a 227hp petrol-hybrid powertrain, offering improved efficiency with a claimed 25 km/l.

Toyoto Glanza.Title: TOYOTO GLANZA
Toyoto Glanza.description: The Toyota Glanza is a premium hatchback offering a sleek design, efficient 1.2L petrol engine, and a strong hybrid option. It is equipped with features like a 7-inch touchscreen infotainment system, automatic climate control, and safety features such as dual airbags and ABS.

Toyota Urban Cruiser Taisor.Title: TOYOTA URBAN CRUISER TAISOR
Toyota Urban Cruiser Taisor.description: The Toyota Urban Cruiser Taisor is a compact SUV offering stylish design and practical features, making it a solid choice for urban commuting. It is available with two engine options: a 1.2-liter naturally aspirated petrol engine and a more powerful 1.0-liter turbo-petrol engine.

Toyota Fortuner.Title: TOYOTA FORTUNER
Toyota Fortuner.description: The Toyota Fortuner is a rugged, mid-size SUV with a strong off-road heritage, well-suited for both urban and tough terrain driving. It features a robust 2.8-liter turbo-diesel engine that delivers around 201 horsepower and 500 Nm of torque, coupled with a 6-speed automatic transmission and four-wheel drive capabilities.

Toyota Taisor.Title: TOYOTA TAISOR
Toyota Taisor.description: The Toyota Taisor is a compact SUV that offers a stylish design and modern features. It shares many similarities with the Maruti Suzuki Fronx but comes with distinct Toyota touches, including a unique grille, LED tail-lights, and a more premium feel in terms of cabin materials.

Toyota Venza Ev.Title: TOYOTA VENZA EV
Toyota Venza Ev.description: The Toyota Venza EV is anticipated to be an all-electric version of the Toyota Venza, a midsize SUV known for its comfortable ride and upscale design. Though official specs for the Venza EV haven’t been fully detailed, it’s expected to align with Toyota's latest innovations in electric vehicle technology.

Toyota Sienna Ev.Title: TOYOTA SIENNA EV
Toyota Sienna Ev.description: The Toyota Sienna EV, if introduced, would be the all-electric version of Toyota's popular Sienna minivan, known for its spacious interior and family-friendly features. Although Toyota hasn’t officially released details, an electric Sienna would likely focus on providing a high-capacity battery with a practical driving range and fast-charging capabilities, designed for families needing a reliable, eco-friendly vehicle.

Audi A3 Sportback revealed.Title: AUDI A3 SPORTBACK REVEALED
Audi A3 Sportback revealed.description: The latest Audi A3 Sportback is a stylish and sporty hatchback, combining Audi's signature design elements with modern tech and performance. It offers an updated exterior with sleek lines, a wider stance, and a bold, redesigned grille, giving it an athletic and contemporary look.

Audi A3 40 TFSI Premium.Title: AUDI A3 40 TFSI PREMIUM
Audi A3 40 TFSI Premium.description: The Audi A3 40 TFSI Premium is a compact luxury sedan that combines performance, technology, and Audi’s elegant design. The “40 TFSI” badge indicates a turbocharged 2.0-liter engine that delivers strong performance with around 184 horsepower, providing a balanced mix of power and fuel efficiency.

Audi A6.Title: AUDI A6
Audi A6.description: The Audi A6 is a midsize luxury sedan known for its refined design, advanced technology, and balanced performance. With a sleek, sophisticated exterior, the A6 features Audi’s signature LED headlights, bold grille, and aerodynamic lines, giving it a modern and elegant look.

Audi e-tron GT.Title: AUDI e-TRON GT
Audi e-tron GT.description: The Audi e-tron GT is a high-performance electric sedan that combines Audi luxury design with cutting-edge electric vehicle technology. It features a striking, aerodynamic exterior with sleek lines, a wide stance, and LED lighting, giving it a sporty and futuristic appearance.

Audi Q3.Title: AUDI Q3
Audi Q3.description: The Audi Q3 is a compact luxury SUV that combines practicality, style, and Audi’s renowned technology. With a bold and sporty exterior, it features Audi’s signature Singleframe grille, sleek LED headlights, and sculpted lines, giving it a modern and premium look.

Audi Q5.Title: AUDI Q5
Audi Q5.description: The Audi Q5 is a popular midsize luxury SUV known for its blend of style, technology, and performance. It features a refined and athletic exterior, with Audi's signature Singleframe grille, sleek LED headlights, and a modern, aerodynamic design.

Audi RS e-tron GT Ev.Title: AUDI RS E-TRON GT EV
Audi RS e-tron GT Ev.description: The Audi RS e-tron GT is the high-performance electric variant of Audi's e-tron GT, designed to offer thrilling driving dynamics alongside advanced electric technology. With an aggressive, sleek design, it features bold lines, a wide stance, and Audi's signature LED lighting, giving it a futuristic yet sporty appearance.

Audi Q8 Sportback e-tron Ev.Title: AUDI Q8 SPORTBACK E-TRON EV
Audi Q8 Sportback e-tron Ev.description: The Audi Q8 Sportback e-tron is the sportier, coupe-style variant of Audi's flagship electric SUV, the Q8 e-tron. It combines the performance and luxury of the Q8 e-tron with a more dynamic and sleek design, featuring a sloping roofline and a more aggressive, athletic stance.

Renault KWID.Title: RENAULT KWID
Renault KWID.description: The Renault KWID is a compact hatchback that offers a blend of affordability, practicality, and modern design, making it a popular choice in the entry-level car segment. With its SUV-inspired design, the KWID features bold, angular lines, a high ground clearance, and a rugged front grille, giving it a strong road presence despite its small size.

Renault Pulse Diesel RxL ABS.Title: RENAULT PULSE DIESEL RXL ABS
Renault Pulse Diesel RxL ABS.description: The Renault Pulse Diesel RXL ABS is a compact hatchback known for its fuel efficiency, practicality, and urban-friendly design. Powered by a 1.5-liter diesel engine, it offers a good balance of power and excellent fuel economy, making it ideal for both city commutes and longer drives.

Renault Scala.Title: RENAULT SCALA
Renault Scala.description: The Renault Scala is a compact sedan that offers a blend of stylish design, comfort, and practicality. It features a sleek, elegant exterior with a modern front grille, bold lines, and a well-defined silhouette, giving it a premium feel in the compact sedan segment.

Renault Fluence.Title: RENAULT FLUENCE
Renault Fluence.description: The Renault Fluence is a midsize sedan that offers a comfortable and premium driving experience, focusing on efficiency, style, and practicality. Its elegant design features smooth lines, a sculpted front grille, and a refined profile, giving it a sophisticated and contemporary look.

Renault Bigster SUV.Title: RENAULT BIGSTER SUV
Renault Bigster SUV.description: The Renault Bigster SUV is an upcoming mid-size SUV designed to offer a combination of rugged capability, modern design, and spacious interiors. Positioned as a more premium offering in Renault’s SUV lineup, the Bigster features a bold, muscular design with sharp lines, a prominent front grille, and a higher ground clearance, making it suitable for both city driving and off-road adventures.

Renault Duster.Title: RENAULT DUSTER
Renault Duster.description: The Renault Duster is a compact SUV known for its rugged performance, practicality, and affordability. It features a bold, muscular design with high ground clearance, giving it an adventurous, off-road-ready look, while still being well-suited for urban driving.

Renault Zoe Ev.Title: RENAULT ZOE EV
Renault Zoe Ev.description: The Renault Zoe EV is a compact, fully electric hatchback designed for urban driving, offering an eco-friendly and practical alternative to traditional combustion engine cars. Known for its compact size, the Zoe is ideal for city commutes, providing easy maneuverability and a zero-emissions driving experience.

Renault Arkana Ev.Title: RENAULT ARKANA EV
Renault Arkana Ev.description: The Renault Arkana EV is an electric version of the stylish Renault Arkana, a coupe-SUV that blends sportiness with practicality. Known for its sleek, coupe-inspired design, the Arkana features a sloping roofline, a bold front grille, and sharp lines, giving it a dynamic and modern appearance.

Honda Jazz Zx.Title: HONDA JAZZ ZX
Honda Jazz Zx.description: The Honda Jazz ZX is a premium variant of the popular Honda Jazz, a compact hatchback known for its practicality, reliability, and efficient performance. The Jazz ZX features a modern, stylish design with sharp lines, a bold front grille, and a compact yet spacious profile, making it an ideal choice for urban driving.

Honda Jazz Active.Title: HONDA JAZZ ACTIVE
Honda Jazz Active.description: The Honda Jazz Active is an entry-level variant of the popular Honda Jazz, designed to offer great value for money with a combination of practicality and efficient performance. It features a compact yet stylish design, with smooth lines and a functional, urban-friendly look.

Honda City ZX.Title: HONDA CITY ZX
Honda City ZX.description: The Honda City ZX is the top variant of the popular Honda City sedan, known for its premium features, stylish design, and refined performance. The City ZX boasts a sleek and modern exterior with sharp lines, a bold front grille, and a well-sculpted profile, giving it an upscale, executive sedan look.

Honda Amaze Diesel Zx.Title: HONDA AMAZE DIESEL ZX
Honda Amaze Diesel Zx.description: The Honda Amaze Diesel ZX is the top variant of the popular Honda Amaze compact sedan, known for its fuel efficiency, comfortable ride, and reliable performance. The Amaze Diesel ZX features a sleek and modern design with clean lines, a sculpted front grille, and a compact yet spacious profile, making it suitable for both city commutes and highway drives.

Honda Elevate.Title: HONDA ELEVATE
Honda Elevate.description: The Honda Elevate is a compact SUV that marks Honda's entry into the highly competitive SUV segment in several markets. With a bold and modern design, the Elevate features a strong front grille, sharp LED headlights, and a robust profile, giving it a dynamic and premium look suited for urban and off-road driving.

Honda WR-v.Title: HONDA WR-V
Honda WR-v.description: The Honda WR-V is a compact crossover that blends the practicality of a hatchback with the versatility of an SUV. Known for its elevated stance and bold, modern design, the WR-V features a sleek front grille, sharp headlights, and a robust profile, making it a great option for urban and light off-road driving.

Honda Elevate Ev.Title: HONDA ELEVATE EV
Honda Elevate Ev.description: The Honda City EV is the electric version of the popular Honda City sedan, combining the iconic City design with eco-friendly electric power. This electric variant brings a modern twist to the well-known sedan, offering zero-emissions driving while maintaining the City’s reputation for comfort, style, and reliability.

Honda Prologue Ev.Title: HONDA PROLOGUE EV
Honda Prologue Ev.description: The Honda Prologue EV is Honda's flagship all-electric SUV, designed to combine advanced technology, a spacious interior, and a bold, modern design. As part of Honda’s commitment to a sustainable future, the Prologue EV is aimed at delivering an eco-friendly driving experience without compromising on performance or comfort.
